name: Akroma's Vengeance
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

name: Congregate
oracle_text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—Song of All, canto 642

name: Kor Sanctifiers
oracle_text: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Orim's Thunder
oracle_text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

name: Prison Term
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may attach Prison Term to that creature.

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

name: Broodstar
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

name: Fabricate
oracle_text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

name: Keep Watch
oracle_text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

name: Master of Etherium
oracle_text: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

name: Qumulox
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
flavor_text: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

name: Sarcomite Myr
oracle_text: {2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

name: Thirst for Knowledge
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
flavor_text: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

name: Vedalken Engineer
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
flavor_text: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

name: Whiplash Trap
oracle_text: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Ascendant Evincar
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Other black creatures get +1/+1.
Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.
flavor_text: His soul snared by an angel's curse, Crovax twisted heroism into its purest shadow.

name: Beacon of Unrest
oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
flavor_text: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

name: Beseech the Queen
oracle_text: ({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

name: Cadaverous Knight
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
flavor_text:
Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.
—Shadow Guild saying

name: Consume Spirit
oracle_text: Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

name: Corpse Harvester
oracle_text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Cruel Revival
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

name: Death Baron
oracle_text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
flavor_text: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Dregscape Zombie
oracle_text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

name: Festering Goblin
oracle_text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

name: Grave Pact
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

name: Helldozer
oracle_text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, untap Helldozer.
flavor_text: Sometimes you go to hell, and sometimes hell comes to you.

name: Hideous End
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

name: Incremental Blight
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.
flavor_text: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

name: Innocent Blood
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

name: Nefashu
oracle_text: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Where the nefashu pass, blood rolls like a silk carpet.

name: Noxious Ghoul
oracle_text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.

name: Phyrexian Arena
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Profane Command
oracle_text: Choose two —
• Target player loses X life.
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Rotting Rats
oracle_text: When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.

Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Shepherd of Rot
oracle_text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Soulless One
oracle_text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
flavor_text: "Surrender your soul to me."

name: Syphon Mind
oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

name: Undead Warchief
oracle_text: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.
flavor_text: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

name: Withered Wretch
oracle_text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

name: Arc Lightning
oracle_text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor_text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Bogardan Firefiend
oracle_text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

name: Bogardan Rager
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Browbeat
oracle_text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to them. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor_text:
"Even the threat of power has power."
—Jeska, warrior adept

name: Cinder Elemental
oracle_text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.

name: Cone of Flame
oracle_text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

name: Flamekin Harbinger
oracle_text: When Flamekin Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elemental card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

name: Flametongue Kavu
oracle_text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

name: Furnace of Rath
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor_text: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

name: Goblin Offensive
oracle_text: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: They certainly are.

name: Insurrection
oracle_text: Untap all creatures and gain control of them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Maybe they wanted to be on the winning side for once."
—Matoc, lavamancer

name: Keldon Champion
oracle_text: Haste
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Menacing Ogre
oracle_text: Trample, haste

When Menacing Ogre enters the battlefield, each player secretly chooses a number. Then those numbers are revealed. Each player with the highest number loses that much life. If you are one of those players, put two +1/+1 counters on Menacing Ogre.

name: Pyrotechnics
oracle_text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text:
"Who says lightning never strikes twice?"
—Storm shaman

name: Reckless Charge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Relentless Assault
oracle_text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
flavor_text: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

name: Rockslide Elemental
oracle_text: First strike
Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rockslide Elemental.
flavor_text: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

name: Rolling Thunder
oracle_text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

name: Rorix Bladewing
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text: In the smoldering ashes of Shiv, a few dragons strive to rebuild their native land. The rest seek any opportunity to restore the broken pride of their race.

name: Smokebraider
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
flavor_text: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

name: Taurean Mauler
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.
flavor_text: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

name: Beast Hunt
oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Briarhorn
oracle_text: Flash
When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Explosive Vegetation
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text: Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Fertilid
oracle_text: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

name: Forgotten Ancient
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
flavor_text: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

name: Ivy Elemental
oracle_text: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

name: Living Hive
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor_text: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Silverglade Elemental
oracle_text: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Tornado Elemental
oracle_text: When Tornado Elemental enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.
You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

name: Tribal Unity
oracle_text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

name: Verdant Force
oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: Left to itself, nature overflows any container, overthrows any restriction, and overreaches any boundary.

name: Boros Swiftblade
oracle_text: Double strike
flavor_text: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

name: Branching Bolt
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free."
—Rakka Mar

name: Bull Cerodon
oracle_text: Vigilance, haste
flavor_text: It holds motionless vigil, watching Naya in silence through the screen of the whitecover. When it senses anything amiss, it launches forward with the uncanny sound of torn fog.

name: Captain's Maneuver
oracle_text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to another target creature, planeswalker, or player instead.
flavor_text: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

name: Cerodon Yearling
oracle_text: Vigilance, haste
flavor_text: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

name: Fires of Yavimaya
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Glory of Warfare
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get +0/+2.
flavor_text: "Their hopes dashed on our shields! Their victory slashed by our swords!"

name: Hull Breach
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.
flavor_text: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the Predator crashing into his stronghold."

name: Lightning Helix
oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

name: Mage Slayer
oracle_text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Equip {3}
flavor_text:
"When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do."
—Kresh the Bloodbraided

name: Razia, Boros Archangel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance, haste
{T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor_text: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

name: Rumbling Slum
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.
flavor_text: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

name: Savage Twister
oracle_text: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook! pook! pook!—before we ran for the wadi."
—Travelogue of Najat

name: Sludge Strider
oracle_text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control or another artifact you control leaves the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Underneath the cities of Esper are cycles of life unseen by those who feed them.

name: Arsenal Thresher
oracle_text: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

flavor_text: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

name: Boros Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
{1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Double Cleave
